page.title: 15CLOPTONS TRANSPORT
page.content: There is one bus service through the village of Clopton, running twice a week. It runs from Woodbridge to Ipswich and back. There are also 2 school buses run by the local County Council to take the children to Grundisburgh Primary School and Farlingaye High School at Woodbridge. There are no railway services, the nearest being either Ipswich or Woodbridge, and there are no airports locally. The nearest ferry-port is at Felixstowe. Most people have their own transport in the form of cars or bicycles.
